column3: News;Sihanoukville:------  A blaze ripped through Chinese construction worker’s temporary shelters at the end of Ochheuteal Beach just before midnight on January 18
column4: 2019. Police forces and military police using fire trucks put out the fire in around an hour.------The cause is believed to be from an electrical  fault. In total 12 rooms on 2 floors were destroyed.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/285746
